Award.AwardTitle: Student Travel Support for ACM HotMobile 2015

Directorate.LongName: Direct For Computer & Info Scie & Enginr

Division.LongName: Division Of Computer and Network Systems

Award.AbstractNarration:
This award will support students at U.S. institutions to attend the Sixteenth Workshop on Mobile Computing Systems and Applications (ACM HotMobile 2015). HotMobile, sponsored by ACM SIGMOBILE, will be held in February, 2015 in Santa Fe, New Mexico. HotMobile 2015 is an important workshop targeting mobile computing and system integration fields and attending this event will benefit the scientific progress of the student's research. The exposure to the technical content of HotMobile 2015 will inspire students to address the tough problems in their respective fields, with a long-term benefit of scientific advances in these types of networks.

Priority will be given to students who will benefit from attending this workshop, but are unlikely to attend due to the unavailability of travel funding. In addition, applications from female and underrepresented groups in networking research will be strongly encouraged. Up to fourteen students will receive travel grants from this award to attend HotMobile 2015.

ProgramReference.Text: EXP PROG TO STIM COMP RES
